html:
3.2.21  12:43 am   In "La de da de da de da de day oh" you rhymed "mall" 3 times, was there any hidden meaning behind that?

      it's like when someone knocks on the door. it's done multiple times to increase the chances that the person on the otherside of the door will hear

3.2.21  12:08 am   Hey Bill Wurtz, what do you take when making a music video and song?

      "a reasonable amount of time"

3.1.21  11:19 pm   bill, help, what is the easiest way to make a jazzy chord progression?

      what the heck is a jazzy chord progression

3.1.21  9:55 pm   in your song "long long long journey" how long was the journey exactly 

      about a medium length

3.1.21  9:40 pm   How often are serious answers vs joke answers here?

      every day

3.1.21  8:48 pm   did some of the lyrics in "might quit" allude to the year-long pause on your channel after the music video was posted?

     absolutely not

      I've always thought about typing a huge explanation on how each lyric would connect to the pause.

     at the time that song was produced, i was still convinced i was going to be able to do 1 per week. it wasn't until after that video AND the next song recording were finished that i realized the plans might change

3.1.21  8:37 pm   during what time of the day do you usually write songs?

      it doesn't matter what time

3.1.21  8:21 pm   What do you think is the most powerful feeling?

     walking through a door

     How do you feel more of it?

     walk through a hallway

3.1.21  6:54 pm   Is there a story behind "slow down"? It is one of my favorite songs on the song page 

     i wrote and recorded it extremely quickly

3.1.21  4:52 pm   why did you take such a long break

      i've never taken a break. that could be the reason i'm so.......... broken

3.1.21  4:24 pm   in your song "Might quit" did you actually end up quitting?

      that's not about me, but, no

3.1.21  3:46 pm   2.28.21  2:07 pm why is there a C chord?

     for that sort of party atmosphere

     D mixo?

      yes

3.1.21  3:07 pm   Are you stuck in a different dimension where you can only communicate with us through song?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.1.21  2:52 pm   Which videos were the most fun to make?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.1.21  2:18 pm   Would you ever make a song about air?

      yes

3.1.21  1:09 pm   Will you make more songs based on places you visit like "new canaan", "in california", and "mount st. helens is about to blow up"?

      yes

3.1.21  11:52 am   How do you know if your song is too long?

      if you wanted it to end sooner than it actually did

3.1.21  11:05 am   from "im best friends with my own frond door" how much can you actually bench press?

      maybe 1 to 2 breakfasts

3.1.21  10:24 am   what's your opinion on music

      it's pretty good

3.1.21  10:16 am   What is the best psychological experiment you've seen?

      having a brain

3.1.21  9:51 am   what time signature is 'i wanna be a movie star' in

      mostly 9/4, but the verses and bridge may have certain deviations from that

3.1.21  9:48 am   Whats your opinion on polyrhythms

     they're pretty good

      and will you use them in future songs/ 

     sure

3.1.21  8:19 am   did you do a bad thing and if so did you regret the thing you did and will you tell us what it is

      i tried to do everything

3.1.21  6:09 am   I have ideas of music to compose all day, but when it comes to writing or playing them on my piano, I forgot everything, even though I thought about it five minutes ago; how can I avoid that?

      write it down in less than 5 minutes

3.1.21  5:42 am   how do you come up with your tweets?

      first i start with a mediocre tweet, then i try to make it worse and worse and worse until finally it is ready to post.

3.1.21  5:30 am   Why do you normally use a sawtooth synth in most of your jazz covers?

      that's the sound of the the letters 'zz' in the word 'jazz'

3.1.21  5:12 am   what song do you think you only have the only copy in the entire world of?

      wouldn't want to jinx it

3.1.21  5:01 am   i think one of the things that's so compelling and satisfying about your music video style, and your musical style for that matter, re-watching 'here comes the sun' for the 15th time or whatever, is how understated a lot of things are, but also how overt and flashy certain things are. like, you'll have little moments that i don't even think about after several viewings, but then i see and i'm like, that's such a nice little moment, a little clip in the background of you doing a little finger wave with your hand or a little random stick figure guy climbing for a second or whatever. that's part of what's so incredible about your style is you have a very acute sense of how to keep things moving, not lingering too long on something, almost cutting things off before they have a chance to be boring, but just long enough to have an impact. it's very scintillating, if i'm allowed to use that word. anyways i hope your new music video is going well and you're doing go od in general. you're one of the most inspiring modern musicians/artists to me and it's really humbling and exciting to be alive at the same time as you. i wish you all the success and happiness that you can handle. 

      holy main wing of the building, you've come equipped with kindness

3.1.21  4:15 am   Do you have a favourite song of yours and if so what is it?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.1.21  3:54 am   where do you learn you chords from?

     playing the keyboard, and/or listening to other people's music

     trial and error?

     sure

     or you have a database?

     that would seem nice, but the problem with that is, the line between chords and non-chords becomes quite blurred as you start to cross it. so the database always falls apart as soon as you try to figure out how many items it should have

     if so, how do you categorize them?

3.1.21  2:25 am   What do you do when you're not writing music?

      record it, make video for it, sometimes write some non-music and make video for that

3.1.21  1:50 am   Writing down ideas is the best thing that has ever happened to me. How did people survive in times before writing things down was really, really easy?

      could do stonehenge

3.1.21  1:32 am   is the jeans sound in "at the airport terminal the shaker like sound in the last verse?

      yes that is jeans





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

2.28.21  11:13 pm   will you ever make some sort of video where you just explain yourself and your whole music journey and such?

      that usually doesn't fit in 1 video, but, yes

2.28.21  10:38 pm   Are you going to do an anything video anytime soon?

      yes

2.28.21  10:21 pm   where did you get your fish plush from??????

      it's been in the family for years

2.28.21  9:58 pm   would you mind listing the bpm of here comes the sun and just did a bad thing for educational purposes? thanks

      here comes the sun is 130 and just did a bad thing is 117

2.28.21  9:53 pm   what font do you use

      regular

2.28.21  8:54 pm   do you have a regular upload schedule now?

     i wish

     or one in mind?

     yes

2.28.21  8:26 pm   How many things have you ACTUALLY DONE in "maybe I could eat blades of grass"?

      i've made a fictional video of approximately 1 minute in length, within a 2 week time limit

2.28.21  7:36 pm   What is your favorite household object to use as a makeshift instrument?

      door

2.28.21  6:04 pm   this website is not comic sans, how do you feel about betraying your own style.

      i'm not betraying my own style, but i was going to ask how do you feel about betraying your own question

2.28.21  5:44 pm   What question did Damien Maymdien skip?

      this one

2.28.21  4:42 pm   In the cover of the song "Outside" on Spotify you wrote the tittle differently: "o.u.t.s.i.d.e". Why? Is it the abbreviation of something?

      that is art, for the cover. could call it 'cover art'

2.28.21  4:33 pm   how to find good when everything feels bad

      rotate

2.28.21  4:30 pm   When writing songs, do you compose the melody or draft the lyrics first?

      if it's going well, it's at exactly the same time

2.28.21  3:53 pm   in your song "might quit", what exactly is the land of the 2 letter words? 

      2 lines of the song where i accidentally challenged myself to use only 2 letter words

2.28.21  2:07 pm   what key is sweet home alabama in?

      D

2.28.21  1:48 pm   is your song 'new canaan' actually based on a true story?

      yes

2.28.21  9:23 am   How do you find ideas for your music

      usually i just write about writing
